item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 28, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

22. VW breach exposes location of 800k electric vehicles (167 points | 167 comments)

25. Pseudonymity in Academic Publishing (31 points | 6 comments)
26. They have not been trained for this (504 points | 85 comments)

28. Complain and Propose (2014) (75 points | 28 comments)
29. Cable-cutting tanker seized by Finland 'was loaded with spying equipment' (43 points | discuss)
30. Ghostty 1.0 (2110 points | 615 comments)
